extendedInfo.description: Pop Balloon with your baby!When first played, your baby may not be able to accurately touch the moving balloon with his/her hand.Play the game with your baby consistently for a few days or weeks, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands.This game must be played in the presence of a parent, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game at first. âWhen to play! âWhen your baby is cranky or will not stop crying, playing this application can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds, animated animals, and vibration stimulate your baby's curiosity.) âThis application may show better results than rattles or dolls. âThis application is exceptionally handy for parents who spend ample time with their babies but cannot figure out how to fill that time usefully. This application may be too advanced for infants under 12 months old.â»Caution âPlaying the application for an excessive amount of time or leaving the children alone with the device is not encouraged.  âBe cautious of injury due to dropping the device. (Place the device on a flat surface or hold it in your hand.) âKeep the device distant from your eyes.  âBabies tend to unawarely press the "home" button on the device while playing. As this may lead to your baby altering settings on your device, please do not leave your baby alone with your device. Remove advertisements : http://goo.gl/d8xtUChristmas version (free) : http://goo.gl/OeB5ZPlease leave your valuable feedback : http://goo.gl/zFNL2Meet more of our "My Baby" series : http://goo.gl/6wmxBâ¥You are so good mom, dad. :)

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: My 16 month old & almost 5 year old love this game! They always grab my phone to play and fight for turns! Other than learning to share, they love this app!! **Update: Would LOVE a child lock!! 4* until that:)
reviews.author: Brittany Pittman

reviews.title: A baby game with banner adverts
reviews.comment: A game that involves kids to bash the screen to pop balloons with a banner advert for all sorts of applications of unknown origins.   Sorry... 0 rating. It does not take a genius to figure out that kids will press any picture they see, and within seconds are either at a dodgy website or in the play store.
reviews.author: Richard Parsons

reviews.title: Bad pop up placement
reviews.comment: This would get 5 stars, because my baby likes the game, but the pop ups are poorly placed...every time she plays it she accidentally hits the pop up bar and we have to pry it from her hand to back out of them...a lock design would be great
reviews.author: Dana Kay Green

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS APP
reviews.comment: Yes caps lock was necessary. My son is 4yo, autistic and nonverbal. He loves balloon pop games, and this one is a winner. Very simple, easy concept for the kids to grasp, and the surprises in random balloons is fun! If i had one \"suggestion\" it would be to vary the surprises, maybe some confetti or simple \"fireworks\" added in...but definitely great as is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very poorly located ads
reviews.comment: This app is only usable for a few seconds until the ads are accidentally hit by small (but eager) fingers, which closes the app and loads the ad. Poorly designed, which is a waste of potential. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: My 6 month old loves this game! Unfortunately she doesn\'t getting play it much bc I get frustrated having to turn the game back on or exit out of an ad every 2 minutes. I understand that bc its a free apparently you need the ads & I\'m ok with that, but this app desperately needs a child lock!!!!!  I have a child lock on most other games & it makes everything so much better!! Its kind of a pain if you get a phone call but that\'s well worth not having to fix the game for a screaming 6 month old every 2 mins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
reviews.comment: Great colorful animations very bright and attractive to the eye. The music is very upbeat and happy too. Keeps my children happy for quite a while. I recommend this game to parents with little ones. Very well calibrated, does not take ages for the bubbles to pop. Had down loaded a bubble popping app before very boring no music no colors. only down side is the ads other than that fantastic game five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for kids!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. I downloaded it for my 19 month old son and he loves it! Plus, it keeps him occupied for a good amount of time, which is wonderful on road trips!
reviews.author: Jilliane David

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: My daughter loves it. I just don\'t like how easy it closes and my daughter always manages to open the ad because it\'s right on the screen Where she\'s popping balloons. :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: My 10 month old loves this game! She has been playing for a month now. She loves the music and dances to it while she plays and pokes the balloon. My only issue is there is no child lock! Please fix!
reviews.author: Jessi Conahey

reviews.title: Grandmas littleman
reviews.comment: My grandson loves it !! He plays with it for hrs .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cost me 15$
reviews.comment: Pitty. My daughter loved it. Ad she pressed, went to a web site. Nxt thing a sms saying ive subscribed to a service. Poor advertisement on a babies game. Uninstalled. A 0 stars if i could.
reviews.author: Damian Jones

reviews.title: Ads get pushed
reviews.comment: My daughter likes it but she accidentally pushes the ads and she gets sad. Wish there were no ads and then I would give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ruben Rodriguez

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game for children
reviews.author: Ritu Pb

reviews.title: not bad
reviews.comment: decent enough to entertain a kid
reviews.author: Prashanth Padmanabha

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Ad takes up so much of the screen that the child goes directly for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun..
reviews.comment: My 2 & 1/2 little boy loves this..
reviews.author: Patricia Adams

reviews.title: My one year old loves it
reviews.comment: My daughter who is 17 months loves this. She dances to the music and loves the popping sounds with the animal sounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My son loves it
reviews.author: kingsly koilraj

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is great. And when you install Kid Mode too you dont have to worry about any of the pop up adds.
reviews.author: Jennifer Ewald
